Definition: You are given a title and three random sentences from a five-sentence story for this task.   Your job is to choose the two sentence from three given options that connect seamlessly with the rest of the story, as well as their position in the sentence order; keep in mind that the chosen options can fit into the story at any point. Your response must be in the form '2a,5b,' where '2a' indicates that the candidate sentence 'a' will be inserted as the second sentence in the story. The answer must also be in the order of the chosen options, i.e. '2a,5b' is acceptable but '5b,2a' is not.
